content: this is a free written crochet pattern on my crochet blog includes colour photos sample uses 10 colours but can easily be used as a stash-buster 9 colours - 100g of each and 200g of a 10th colour this is also used for the border gauge 1 wide rectangle as per pattern for the first rectangle 6 row with a starting chain of 23 = 14 cm x 4 5 cm adjust hook size as necessary gauge is not critical for this project but may affect yarn quantities size can easily be adapted by adding more or less row and columns
